name: Cat Clicker | a cookie-clicker inspired clicker game!
name_original: Cat Clicker | a cookie-clicker inspired clicker game!
description:
In Cat Clicker you collect as much cats as possible because, well, they're cute! In this little cookie-clicker inspired game you click to gain cats. With those cats you can buy upgrades to get even more cats! 

Can you find out what all the upgrades are?

Check our website for more games:

Click!

Thank you for playing and be sure to leave some feedback here.
